name: Anuj Kaushik
course: 5 Yr. Integrated M.Tech in Mathematics & Computing
references: Tech Co-Founders / CTOs of any of the startups mentioned in the CV.

byteswan.name: Byteswan
byteswan.description: I work as a full-time director of engineering with early stage startups (6m-1y timeframe), doing whatever-it-takes to get them to their next stage. I contribute across : coding, hiring, people management, devops, dev-processes, strategy, product & design.

aurva.name: Aurva
aurva.description: A seed stage startup building an enterprise data security product for US and India markets. Contributed on coding, architecture, product, design, hiring and micro-managing execution. Helped them close their first 5 big ticket enterprise customers.

doco.name: Doco
doco.description: Built the entire product from scratch, drove customer acquisition and got their TPV to 25L per month, enabling them to raise their pre-seed.

confidential_02.name: Confidential
confidential_02.description: Made a detailed engineering org plan : Tech architecture (backend, frontend, apps, infra), team budget and hiring, time/cost estimations.

durianpay.name: Durianpay
durianpay.description: A seed stage startup building a payment gateway for Indonesia. Led an engg team of ~15 members split across Bangalore and Jakarta, contributing on architecture, people management, execution & hiring.

aasthy.name: Aasthy
aasthy.description: Hired, then led a small engineering team of 6 devs for an angel funded startup building a fractional real estate investment platform.

confidential_01.name: Confidential
confidential_01.description: Led a team of 3 contractors to deliver multiple small games for an indie game studio.

moonfrog.name: Moonfrog Labs
moonfrog.stack: Golang, Redshift, AWS, NodeJs, Cocos2Dx, Unity
descriptions: Contributions as EM : Led engineering for Moonfrog’s biggest game TPG (TeenPattiGold). Complete ownership of engg execution, processes, roadmap, live-ops. Game had 4M DAU, 11M MAU. Total team size reporting to me averaged around 25 (dev + devops). I also owned company wide hiring for engineering. Revamped the engg hiring process. Upskilled high potential ICs to take up company wide roles and mentored team-leads to become EMs.

Contributions as SSE : Complete ownership of Moonfrog Analytics Infra. Scaled the ETL-Pipeline to ingest 12B (from 2B) events per day and the warehouse infra to handle approx 12 TB. Built functionality for observability, auditing, rate-limiting, reporting, anomalies, on-demand data population, game client and server side and various other automations. Hired and led a team of 4 engineers later on.

proptiger.name: Proptiger
descriptions: Led the demand-side engineering pod for relaunch of makaan.com platform, after acquisition by Proptiger.
Scaled Proptiger Datalabs (B2B product for real-estate trend analysis) to support 20x more data.
Complete ownership of Proptiger and Makaan search infrastructure. Improved the search CTR from 40% to 85%.

exarb.name: Exarb (now Cogmac)
exarb.description: Built an end-to-end trading suite aimed at F&O arbitrage in NSE/BSE markets. Owned the trader facing part of the suite: product + ui/ux + dev + devops + customer support. Products Developed: Fully featured trading terminal with market feeds, P&L calc, reporting; admin portal; internal tools for trade-log analysis, benchmarking, historic analysis, trader behavior analysis

citrix.name: Citrix
citrix.description: Extended GSLB (Global Server Load Balancing) stat aggregation from single box to a cluster for Citrix flagship product - NetScaler. Also, lots of character building maintenance work (250+ bug fixes and small features.).
